description: Pallavi is the daughter of a renowned Indian singer who is continuing in her mother's footsteps as a classical singer, concert performer and teacher. After the death of her mother, she is saddened and loses her confidence and ability to perform. She develops a friendship with an elusive street urchin with a beautiful singing voice, and embarks on a journey of self-discovery and healing. An award winning film by Rajan Khosa which captures the beauty of Indian classical music. Cast includes Kitu Gidwani, Bhaveen Gosain and B.C. Sanyal. In Hindi and English with English subtitles.
